name: SCAVENGE (2018)
description:
SCAVENGE (2018) is a low-poly exploration game I spent 3-months working on back in college for a class. I finally decided to publish it to the internet. All the models are built from free asset packs on the unity asset store. You literally can only walk / run and jump around. Sorry, no item inventory system. Basically you can look, but you can't pick it up.

SETTINGS:

Resolution   --->   [ 640 x 480 ]   to   [ 2560 x 1440 ]

Graphic Quality   --->   low (potato), medium (laptop), high (desktop)

CONTROLS:

ESC   --->   menu

Mouse   --->    camera view

W   --->   forward

A   --->   left

S   --->   backward

D   --->   right

SPACE   --->   jump

SHIFT   --->  accelorate

TELEPORTING: some objects will teleport you to a new area.

1. Fire pits   --->   teleport (except for the one in the forest)

2. Castle door   --->  castle interior

3. Boat   --->   Island (image processing heavy, may crash game on some laptops)

NOTE: 

If enough people are interested, I would be wiling to update this game. However, I have to track down the original unity file first...

UPDATE IDEAS:

1. Inventory system

2. Create more areas

3. 3rd person view

4. Suggestions?
